subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The officials who put on the United States Open are not humorless. The proof is in the pairings for the first two rounds, which appear to have been compiled with a wink and a smile.
snippet: The officials who put on the United States Open are not humorless. The proof is in the pairings for the first two rounds, which appear to have been compiled with a wink and a smile.
